Title: Ching Chong Chang
Writer: Jenji Kohan (creator), Sara Hess, Piper Kerman (book), Jordan Harrison (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks, Michael Harney
Plot: Regime change isn't going over well the staff, but Red makes it work for her. Lorna finds a new way to meet men. Chang shows her private side.
